thread.title: PG&E chief meetswith Obama, joins global warming initiative
thread.title_full: PG&E chief meetswith Obama, joins global warming initiative - San Francisco Chronicle

author: David R. Baker
title: PG&E chief meetswith Obama, joins global warming initiative
text:
Photo: Paul Chinn, The Chronicle PG&E Chairman and CEO Tony Earley (center) greets Vice President Joe Biden, who visited with veterans enrolled in a PG&E Power Pathway workforce development class in Oakland, Calif. on Friday, April 10, 2015. PG&E Chairman and CEO Tony Earley (center) greets Vice President...
Pacific Gas and Electric Co., California’s largest utility, joined a White House effort Monday to rally business support for action on climate change, with the company’s top executive taking part in a roundtable discussion with President Obama. PG&E Chairman and CEO Tony Earley (center) greets Vice President Joe Biden, who visited with veterans enrolled in a PG&E Power Pathway workforce development class in Oakland, Calif. on Friday, April 10, 2015. PG&E Chairman and CEO Tony Earley (center) greets Vice President...
Pacific Gas and Electric Co., California’s largest utility, joined a White House effort Monday to rally business support for action on climate change, with the company’s top executive taking part in a roundtable discussion with President Obama.
